main event: Three observers reported seeing three oval-shaped objects hovering in a backyard in Hyattsville, Maryland, on June 6, 1962.
interesting points: The objects were described as being about the size of a house window and emitting a dull glow., The objects hovered silently at an altitude of approximately 150-200 feet., The observers, familiar with aircraft, confirmed the objects were not conventional aerial vehicles., The sighting lasted for 5-10 minutes before the objects vanished., There were no other witnesses in the immediate area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Mrs. [REDACTED], her daughter, and a visiting friend
